revised_title: Flexure and Torsion in Prisms with Uni-Axial and Asymmetric Cross-Sections
tldr: The author, A. C. Stevenson, investigates flexure and torsion in prisms with uni-axial and asymmetric cross-sections. They discuss the flexural center and provide a complete and exact solution for the Saint-Venant flexure problem for an asymmetric cross-section. The study also highlights the importance of considering the work of Professor W. J. Duncan and the contributions of Zwolinsky in the field.
